data.name: Exclusive Pool and Patio
data.address: 2750 S Preston Rd Ste 116, Celina, TX 75009

reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"I received a consult from 6 companies to add turf trim to my pool deck." "I would not recommend this company to service your regular pool needs." "Worked us into the day, and quickly diagnosed the issue and resolved it."

My husband & I now never have to leave our home again thanks to Zac & his team building an oasis steps from our back door! Zac & his entire crew were fantastic to work with and super communicative throughout the entire process. When we … More Response from the owner 2 weeks ago WOW! Thank you for the amazing review! We were so thrilled to be able to work with you and help you transform your backyard into an Exclusive space! We truly appreciate you and Travis!

After buying a new home w a complicated pool and many features, we interviewed multiple pool service companies. None of them were able to  find/fix our issues, until we were referred to Exclusive pool and patio, they not only found the … More Response from the owner 5 months ago Thank you for the amazing review!

I have been using exclusive for pool service for years. Hunter was always good. Monday they had a new employee doing service. He didn’t add water to the level. Came home from an errand on Thursday and pumps were burned up. This is going to … More Response from the owner a year ago
